storyInfo: Atop Londinium's city walls, General Manfred and his confidant Hoederer watch the chaotic scene unfolding below. He sees an opportunity and activates the city's defense artillery.

attributes.content: 9:27 A.M. \ Overcast
Atop the wall, Sudean Borough, Londinium
There's been a riot at Port 309!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Tell the general the patrol squad has sniffed out the rebels.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: It's not just the rebels! We're exchanging fire with multiple groups––
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: General, can you get us backup?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: How are we doing?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Debugging will take roughly another fifteen minutes.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You've got eight.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: We don't have time to spare here.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You don't need me to go see what's going on down there? Just a suggestion, of course.
You're worried I'll fail.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Of course not. When have your plans ever failed?
My job is just to make sure we've got fewer unknowns along our path to victory.
You've already done more than enough, mercenary.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Come, stand with me. I need you to see for yourself what is going on beneath these walls, before the experiment begins.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Lively.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: How does it compare to the battlefields of Kazdel?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Nothing new.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: But at least... it's not Sarkaz on both sides tearing each other apart.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Surely you hunted, during your time in Kazdel.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You're asking if I've been hunting? Us mercs are out in the wilderness all year 'round. Hunting is how we get fed.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Then, you should understand why I left these ports open.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Sometimes, even if your trap is obvious, a beast will step right into it because there's no other choice.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: If it can't find a way out, it'll panic and run wild. That means we've got to expend energy and spread our forces thin to round up all the wild beasts.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Sure. That's how things go in the wilds, but there's more to it.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Look at the city below us. It is little more than a concrete wilderness.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Who has the confidence to seal off every exit to the wilds themselves? Who can find every nook and cranny in a jungle? Who can secure every last potential hiding spot?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I am certainly not so conceited.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: So that's why you left a few openings. Focus your attention, and wait for the enemies to reveal themselves. That's a pretty efficient way of dealing with it.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: But it does come with one risk.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Nothing ventured, nothing gained, right?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: If I was in your position, I'd do the same thing.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Good. If you're capable of leading mercenaries, you're capable of leading the hunt.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: That's why I'd rather fight alongside you than the relics in the Court.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: And by the looks of things, you'll be feasting tonight.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Not just the rebels, but Dublinn as well...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Wait, I've seen that caster before. She came to see you once. Didn't you sign a truce? Not that either of you took it particularly seriously.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: If you recognize her, then you should also know that people like her don't know when to stop.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You've been wanting to eliminate that variable for a while now, huh?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The situation has changed. His Majesty's opus is reaching its conclusion. If the theatre is too rowdy, it is too easy to overlook an actual threat.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: We need to keep a closer eye on the dukes out there.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Couldn't you just send me to do that?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: If I wanted her dead, I wouldn't even need you.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: What's the problem then?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: 'The Iron Guard of Wellington.'
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You mean...
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: He hasn't made a move on Londinium yet.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: And if he's quiet for even a single day, all the nobles outside Londinium ask their emissaries, first thing in the morning, whether the Iron Duke has spoken.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Which is why we haven't made an enemy of Dublinn, so far.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Now though, since she's the one who lost control and took the first step toward violating our agreement––
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The Sarkaz have no more reason to continue tolerating them.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: So the commotion down there is just the beginning.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Yes. We still need something... more decisive, to take Dublinn out of the picture.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Where the hell did they come from?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I don't know, Captain... I haven't seen these weapons or Arts before!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: They're also fighting the Sarkaz... They're not here to back up the devils?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Not that it matters. We'll eliminate anyone who gets in our way.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Hey––
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Give us our guy back!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: It's... It's you!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: Oh, a familiar face? Too bad I still recognize you after the pummeling I gave you this morning.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Look out behind you––
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: People don't just stand around in a fight and wait for you to run up to them swinging.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Isn't that why I have you?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Don't go too crazy. Remember, we're getting out of here as soon as we secure our target.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: That just means I gotta punch faster.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You're telling me... these are the ones who snatched our mark?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Don't forget their faces.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: No, wait a moment... Try to capture one of them alive. I'm sure the Leader would be interested to find out what new power has its eyes on Londinium.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Uhh... Where are these rocks coming from?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Stay on your guard. We're still not inside the city yet, and the Doctor doesn't want to see anyone get hurt.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Alright... You too!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: She smashed my construct to pieces with one swing of a hammer?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: This one... she's just as nasty as that Victorian soldier!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I wasn't even trying for that one though... See how you like this instead!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Get out of the way, Siege!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Who covered me?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Balin, did you see who that was?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: No, there's too much going on. I can't make heads or tails of it.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Amiya, there's somebody else in this fight.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Someone besides us, Dublinn, and the Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And they just might be on our side.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Captain, the situation isn't looking good for us... Do you think you could bring down this entire wall...?
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: The entire wall, huh? Hah... I've fantasized about it too many times...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: But, not now. We'll still have our chance, whenever the Leader decides to come.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Let's not get too carried away here, and just grit our teeth for the time being...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Hear me. Pack your weapons and try not to leave a mess. I don't want that Manfred devil to come knocking on my door ahead of schedule.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Four minutes. We'll wait four more minutes.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: As it happens, our men haven't had a chance to do anything fun. Defending a city like Londinium is worlds apart from raiding Lateran caravans in the wilderness.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The nice thing about meeting old friends is you don't have to worry about them taking your head. I've got nothing to complain about.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Don't mistake yourself for one of them.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: There aren't a lot of mercenaries out there who could stand being locked up in a little courtyard, reading books all day. That's your department.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I do remember thanking you when you scooped me up and gave me back my sword.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Enough. You're not here to share me this drivel.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Sure, I know.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You need mercenaries, and for more than a couple reasons.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Indeed... And you're as good as they come.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Coincidentally, a few more mercenary squads have joined up with us recently, including some of your old acquaintances from the Scar Market.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: What mercenary could resist an offer from the Regent himself?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: They want more than just the payout from completing a contract or two.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: When we followed the Regent out of Kazdel, each warrior carried a different weapon, some even wearing armor that belonged to the enemy just moments ago.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: But what about now?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: As you've seen, the factories of Londinium now work day and night to produce weapons and armor for us. Our troops are well-regulated, and take orders as a unified unit.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: We are united as never before, and that makes our solidarity stronger than ever.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Yes, all of Victoria... No, all of Terra is watching.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: All according to the Regent's calculations.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Just a year ago, they guffawed about how Londinium's defenses were impenetrable. They thought we were mercenaries in service to some duke.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Profit is no longer the only thing that motivates mercenaries... They are all looking to see what the Sarkaz can do.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: What's a sellsword who's lost interest in selling his sword?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: We're not asking our compatriots to give up their status as mercenaries. They simply found other reasons to follow the Regent.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: They believe he has created a turning point in the fate of the Sarkaz. That we have an opportunity to earn a new identity for ourselves, not just as looters and servants of the powerful.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You need a home to have an identity.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: 'When the Sarkaz desire war, the Sarkaz become war itself––'
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: '––And when each battle ends, the Sarkaz have a home to return to.'
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: This is what the Regent told all the Sarkaz in Londinium. You saw it yourself. That was the first time we met.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I asked what you thought about that statement.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: 'If you're a fighter who crawled out of the ruins of Kazdel, how could you say no to that?'
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: It was three years ago I heard that answer.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Since then, you've left that estate, and now stand with me.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Do you still... hold the same belief?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Manfred, you've earned my loyalty.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Does your left eye still hurt?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: It's been over a year. It healed a long time ago.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I... hope you understand. I've never doubted our friendship, not once since that day.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: But you know what I'm talking about.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The Confessarii don't drop their guard around a merc. That's how they look after the Regent.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: And I... I'm not here to prove my loyalty to anyone. That'd just make me a weaker blade in a fight.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: So your answer is still 'no.'
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: That's fine too.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Sometimes, what I need more is a friend, and for that, Kazdel must temporarily endure the absence of an officer.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: We're ready, General!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Excellent.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Tell the patrol to retreat immediately.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Activate the automatic aiming system and enter the long-distance targeting coordinates––
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: ––Coordinates, Sudean Borough, Port 309.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Our efforts over the last few months are finally about to bear fruit.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Hoederer, will you do the honors?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Lieutenant, Dublinn looks like they're about to win.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: That's not the situation, but it's also not what matters.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Regardless of who wins, what's important is that they keep each other in check.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: That's the situation we need, one that allows your people to charge.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Charge...?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Indeed. While they're too occupied with us, that's your best opportunity to get out of the city.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: No... No!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: What's on your mind, Robben?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Lieutenant, I don't want to leave anymore.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I have to stay.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: But this might be the only chance you have to leave Londinium!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: After the scuffle here today, the Sarkaz will have the gate blocked tomorrow.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Conceal your weapons and blend in with the other civilians! Hurry, get going!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We can't just run away like this.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Lieutenant, we can still fight.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Did you see that? I just took down a Dublinn fighter and injured two Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: This crossbow is... pretty crude. It's nothing like the standard-issue military crossbows we're used to.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: You made it, right? If you even need to make your weapons yourself, don't you also need more men?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: It's not a question of what I need...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: If you don't want to leave, I won't force you.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I don't want to order another good soldier out of the fight, not again, not when she wanted to stay...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Lieutenant...?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: But let's set that aside for now.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We need to get out of here first.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Now's the best shot we're going to get, so if you don't want to move onwards, then fall back with us!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Doctor, the Sarkaz troops are withdrawing from the fight.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I find it strange that after fighting us and Dublinn for so long, the Sarkaz didn't call in reinforcements or start massacring the Dublinn forces.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's not how the Sarkaz usually fight. Even the mercenaries that W brought with her into Reunion fought more ferociously than they did.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, have we fallen into a trap?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This conflict came about so spontaneously and coincidentally... It's as if someone was trying to corral us all together, and then...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Umm, do you think they set all this up for us?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Siege said she found other people who were blending into the crowd just like us... and they seemed to be on the civilians' side.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Might they be the ones the Sarkaz were after?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Combat operators, withdraw from the battlefield immediately.;Scout teams, cover the escape for our combat operators and the civilians.;Everyone, find the nearest place to bunker down and prepare to evacuate!

attributes.content: The Doctor ordered a retreat.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Huh? We're about to complete our rescue though!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: There must be a reason behind it. Let's go.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Grr.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Excuse me, Miss Indra! I, I'm over here!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Thomas?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Don't go over there!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: A flash of light suddenly fills everyone's eyes.
A scalding wave of heat erupts forth, incinerating almost everything it touches.
Though very little solid debris shoots out, the force of the impact reminds the survivors how they were only a single step from death.
And this threat... came from above.
What just happened?!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Did we get a bomb dropped on us? A huge crater... suddenly appeared in the ground?!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Thomas... *cough* *cough*... The smoke's too thick, I can't see anything!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Indra!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Siege told you to stop.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Fine, I owe you another one.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: As long as you get it. Now hurry, let's get out of here––
attributes.name: Dagda
